TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Encoder extends System.Object

summary.span: 对象封装一个全局唯一标识符 (GUID)，它标识图像编码器参数的类别。

span.span: An object encapsulates a globally unique identifier (GUID) that identifies the category of an image encoder parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当向图像编码器传递参数时，将参数封装在对象。When you pass a parameter to an image encoder, the parameter is encapsulated in an object. 域中的一个对象是指定的参数的类别的 GUID。One of the fields of the object is a GUID that specifies the category of the parameter. 使用的静态字段类来检索，其中包含所需的类别的参数。Use the static fields of the class to retrieve an that contains parameters of the desired category. 内置的图像编码器[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]接收属于多个类别的参数。The image encoders that are built into [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] receive parameters that belong to several categories. 下表列出了所有类别和与每个类别关联的 GUID。The following table lists all the categories and the GUID associated with each category. f2e455dc-09b3-4316-8260-676ada32481cf2e455dc-09b3-4316-8260-676ada32481c 66087055-ad66-4c7c-9a18-38a2310b833766087055-ad66-4c7c-9a18-38a2310b8337 e09d739d-ccd4-44ee-8eba-3fbf8be4fc58e09d739d-ccd4-44ee-8eba-3fbf8be4fc58 edb33bce-0266-4a77-b904-27216099e717edb33bce-0266-4a77-b904-27216099e717 1d5be4b5-fa4a-452d-9cdd-5db35105e7eb1d5be4b5-fa4a-452d-9cdd-5db35105e7eb 6d42c53a-229a-4825-8bb7-5c99e2b9a8b86d42c53a-229a-4825-8bb7-5c99e2b9a8b8 292266fc-ac40-47bf-8cfc-a85b89a655de292266fc-ac40-47bf-8cfc-a85b89a655de 3a4e2661-3109-4e56-8536-42c156e7dcfa3a4e2661-3109-4e56-8536-42c156e7dcfa 8d0eb2d1-a58e-4ea8-aa14-108074b7b6f98d0eb2d1-a58e-4ea8-aa14-108074b7b6f9 24d18c76-814a-41a4-bf53-1c219cccf79724d18c76-814a-41a4-bf53-1c219cccf797

span.span: A globally unique identifier that identifies an image encoder parameter category.

summary.span: 根据指定的全局唯一标识符 (GUID) 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class from the specified globally unique identifier (GUID).

summary.span: 此 GUID 指定图像编码器参数类别。

span.span: The GUID specifies an image encoder parameter category.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 内置的图像编码器[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]接收属于多个类别的参数。The image encoders that are built into [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] receive parameters that belong to several categories. 下表列出了所有类别和与每个类别关联的 GUID。The following table lists all the categories and the GUID associated with each category. f2e455dc-09b3-4316-8260-676ada32481cf2e455dc-09b3-4316-8260-676ada32481c 66087055-ad66-4c7c-9a18-38a2310b833766087055-ad66-4c7c-9a18-38a2310b8337 e09d739d-ccd4-44ee-8eba-3fbf8be4fc58e09d739d-ccd4-44ee-8eba-3fbf8be4fc58 edb33bce-0266-4a77-b904-27216099e717edb33bce-0266-4a77-b904-27216099e717 1d5be4b5-fa4a-452d-9cdd-5db35105e7eb1d5be4b5-fa4a-452d-9cdd-5db35105e7eb 6d42c53a-229a-4825-8bb7-5c99e2b9a8b86d42c53a-229a-4825-8bb7-5c99e2b9a8b8 292266fc-ac40-47bf-8cfc-a85b89a655de292266fc-ac40-47bf-8cfc-a85b89a655de 3a4e2661-3109-4e56-8536-42c156e7dcfa3a4e2661-3109-4e56-8536-42c156e7dcfa 8d0eb2d1-a58e-4ea8-aa14-108074b7b6f98d0eb2d1-a58e-4ea8-aa14-108074b7b6f9 24d18c76-814a-41a4-bf53-1c219cccf79724d18c76-814a-41a4-bf53-1c219cccf797

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当向图像编码器传递参数时，将参数封装在对象。When you pass a parameter to an image encoder, the parameter is encapsulated in an object. 域中的一个对象是指定的参数的类别的 GUID。One of the fields of the object is a GUID that specifies the category of the parameter. 使用的静态字段类来检索，其中包含所需的类别的参数。Use the static fields of the class to retrieve an that contains parameters of the desired category. 内置的图像编码器[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]接收属于多个类别的参数。The image encoders that are built into [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] receive parameters that belong to several categories. 下表列出了所有类别和与每个类别关联的 GUID。The following table lists all the categories and the GUID associated with each category. f2e455dc-09b3-4316-8260-676ada32481cf2e455dc-09b3-4316-8260-676ada32481c 66087055-ad66-4c7c-9a18-38a2310b833766087055-ad66-4c7c-9a18-38a2310b8337 e09d739d-ccd4-44ee-8eba-3fbf8be4fc58e09d739d-ccd4-44ee-8eba-3fbf8be4fc58 edb33bce-0266-4a77-b904-27216099e717edb33bce-0266-4a77-b904-27216099e717 1d5be4b5-fa4a-452d-9cdd-5db35105e7eb1d5be4b5-fa4a-452d-9cdd-5db35105e7eb 6d42c53a-229a-4825-8bb7-5c99e2b9a8b86d42c53a-229a-4825-8bb7-5c99e2b9a8b8 292266fc-ac40-47bf-8cfc-a85b89a655de292266fc-ac40-47bf-8cfc-a85b89a655de 3a4e2661-3109-4e56-8536-42c156e7dcfa3a4e2661-3109-4e56-8536-42c156e7dcfa 8d0eb2d1-a58e-4ea8-aa14-108074b7b6f98d0eb2d1-a58e-4ea8-aa14-108074b7b6f9 24d18c76-814a-41a4-bf53-1c219cccf79724d18c76-814a-41a4-bf53-1c219cccf797

summary.span: 用颜色深度参数类别的全局唯一标识符初始化的 对象。

span.span: An object that is initialized with the globally unique identifier for the color depth parameter category.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当向图像编码器传递参数时，将参数封装在对象。When you pass a parameter to an image encoder, the parameter is encapsulated in an object. 域中的一个对象是指定的参数的类别的 GUID。One of the fields of the object is a GUID that specifies the category of the parameter. 使用的静态字段类来检索，其中包含所需的类别的参数。Use the static fields of the class to retrieve an that contains parameters of the desired category. 内置的图像编码器[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]接收属于多个类别的参数。The image encoders that are built into [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] receive parameters that belong to several categories. 下表列出了所有类别和与每个类别关联的 GUID。The following table lists all the categories and the GUID associated with each category. f2e455dc-09b3-4316-8260-676ada32481cf2e455dc-09b3-4316-8260-676ada32481c 66087055-ad66-4c7c-9a18-38a2310b833766087055-ad66-4c7c-9a18-38a2310b8337 e09d739d-ccd4-44ee-8eba-3fbf8be4fc58e09d739d-ccd4-44ee-8eba-3fbf8be4fc58 edb33bce-0266-4a77-b904-27216099e717edb33bce-0266-4a77-b904-27216099e717 1d5be4b5-fa4a-452d-9cdd-5db35105e7eb1d5be4b5-fa4a-452d-9cdd-5db35105e7eb 6d42c53a-229a-4825-8bb7-5c99e2b9a8b86d42c53a-229a-4825-8bb7-5c99e2b9a8b8 292266fc-ac40-47bf-8cfc-a85b89a655de292266fc-ac40-47bf-8cfc-a85b89a655de 3a4e2661-3109-4e56-8536-42c156e7dcfa3a4e2661-3109-4e56-8536-42c156e7dcfa 8d0eb2d1-a58e-4ea8-aa14-108074b7b6f98d0eb2d1-a58e-4ea8-aa14-108074b7b6f9 24d18c76-814a-41a4-bf53-1c219cccf79724d18c76-814a-41a4-bf53-1c219cccf797 ## Examples 下面的示例创建BMP 文件中的对象。The following example creates a object from a BMP file. 该代码将图像保存为 24 位 / 像素的颜色深度的 TIFF 文件。The code saves the image as a TIFF file that has a color depth of 24 bits per pixel. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Imaging.ClassicEncoderExample1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Imaging.ClassicEncoderExample1/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Imaging.ClassicEncoderExample1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Imaging.ClassicEncoderExample1/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Imaging.ClassicEncoderExample1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Imaging.ClassicEncoderExample1/VB/form1.vb#1)]

span.span: The GUID that identifies an image encoder parameter category.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当向图像编码器传递参数时，将参数封装在对象。When you pass a parameter to an image encoder, the parameter is encapsulated in an object. 域中的一个对象是指定的参数的类别的 GUID。One of the fields of the object is a GUID that specifies the category of the parameter. 使用的静态字段类来检索，其中包含所需的类别的参数。Use the static fields of the class to retrieve an that contains parameters of the desired category. 内置的图像编码器[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]接收属于多个类别的参数。The image encoders that are built into [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] receive parameters that belong to several categories. 下表列出了所有类别和与每个类别关联的 GUID。The following table lists all the categories and the GUID associated with each category. f2e455dc-09b3-4316-8260-676ada32481cf2e455dc-09b3-4316-8260-676ada32481c 66087055-ad66-4c7c-9a18-38a2310b833766087055-ad66-4c7c-9a18-38a2310b8337 e09d739d-ccd4-44ee-8eba-3fbf8be4fc58e09d739d-ccd4-44ee-8eba-3fbf8be4fc58 edb33bce-0266-4a77-b904-27216099e717edb33bce-0266-4a77-b904-27216099e717 1d5be4b5-fa4a-452d-9cdd-5db35105e7eb1d5be4b5-fa4a-452d-9cdd-5db35105e7eb 6d42c53a-229a-4825-8bb7-5c99e2b9a8b86d42c53a-229a-4825-8bb7-5c99e2b9a8b8 292266fc-ac40-47bf-8cfc-a85b89a655de292266fc-ac40-47bf-8cfc-a85b89a655de 3a4e2661-3109-4e56-8536-42c156e7dcfa3a4e2661-3109-4e56-8536-42c156e7dcfa 8d0eb2d1-a58e-4ea8-aa14-108074b7b6f98d0eb2d1-a58e-4ea8-aa14-108074b7b6f9 24d18c76-814a-41a4-bf53-1c219cccf79724d18c76-814a-41a4-bf53-1c219cccf797

span.span: Represents an object that is initialized with the globally unique identifier for the luminance table parameter category.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当向图像编码器传递参数时，将参数封装在对象。When you pass a parameter to an image encoder, the parameter is encapsulated in an object. 域中的一个对象是指定的参数的类别的 GUID。One of the fields of the object is a GUID that specifies the category of the parameter. 使用的静态字段类来检索，其中包含所需的类别的参数。Use the static fields of the class to retrieve an that contains parameters of the desired category. 内置的图像编码器[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]接收属于多个类别的参数。The image encoders that are built into [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] receive parameters that belong to several categories. 下表列出了所有类别和与每个类别关联的 GUID。The following table lists all the categories and the GUID associated with each category. f2e455dc-09b3-4316-8260-676ada32481cf2e455dc-09b3-4316-8260-676ada32481c 66087055-ad66-4c7c-9a18-38a2310b833766087055-ad66-4c7c-9a18-38a2310b8337 e09d739d-ccd4-44ee-8eba-3fbf8be4fc58e09d739d-ccd4-44ee-8eba-3fbf8be4fc58 edb33bce-0266-4a77-b904-27216099e717edb33bce-0266-4a77-b904-27216099e717 1d5be4b5-fa4a-452d-9cdd-5db35105e7eb1d5be4b5-fa4a-452d-9cdd-5db35105e7eb 6d42c53a-229a-4825-8bb7-5c99e2b9a8b86d42c53a-229a-4825-8bb7-5c99e2b9a8b8 292266fc-ac40-47bf-8cfc-a85b89a655de292266fc-ac40-47bf-8cfc-a85b89a655de 3a4e2661-3109-4e56-8536-42c156e7dcfa3a4e2661-3109-4e56-8536-42c156e7dcfa 8d0eb2d1-a58e-4ea8-aa14-108074b7b6f98d0eb2d1-a58e-4ea8-aa14-108074b7b6f9 24d18c76-814a-41a4-bf53-1c219cccf79724d18c76-814a-41a4-bf53-1c219cccf797

span.span: Using Image Encoders and Decoders in Managed GDI+

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Drawing.Imaging.Encoder Quality
Public Shared ReadOnly Quality As Encoder

summary.span: 获取使用质量参数类别的全局唯一标识符初始化的 对象。

span.span: Gets an object that is initialized with the globally unique identifier for the quality parameter category.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类别指定的图像的压缩级别。The category specifies the level of compression for an image. 在用于构造，质量类别有用的值的范围是从 0 到 100。When used to construct an , the range of useful values for the quality category is from 0 to 100. 指定的数字越，越高压缩和图像的因此越低质量。The lower the number specified, the higher the compression and therefore the lower the quality of the image. 零将为您提供最低的图像质量和 100 之间的最高。Zero would give you the lowest quality image and 100 the highest. 当向图像编码器传递参数时，将参数封装在对象。When you pass a parameter to an image encoder, the parameter is encapsulated in an object. 域中的一个对象是指定的参数的类别的 GUID。One of the fields of the object is a GUID that specifies the category of the parameter. 使用的静态字段类来检索，其中包含所需的类别的参数。Use the static fields of the class to retrieve an that contains parameters of the desired category. 内置的图像编码器[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]接收属于多个类别的参数。The image encoders that are built into [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] receive parameters that belong to several categories. 下表列出了所有类别和与每个类别关联的 GUID。The following table lists all the categories and the GUID associated with each category. f2e455dc-09b3-4316-8260-676ada32481cf2e455dc-09b3-4316-8260-676ada32481c 66087055-ad66-4c7c-9a18-38a2310b833766087055-ad66-4c7c-9a18-38a2310b8337 e09d739d-ccd4-44ee-8eba-3fbf8be4fc58e09d739d-ccd4-44ee-8eba-3fbf8be4fc58 edb33bce-0266-4a77-b904-27216099e717edb33bce-0266-4a77-b904-27216099e717 1d5be4b5-fa4a-452d-9cdd-5db35105e7eb1d5be4b5-fa4a-452d-9cdd-5db35105e7eb 6d42c53a-229a-4825-8bb7-5c99e2b9a8b86d42c53a-229a-4825-8bb7-5c99e2b9a8b8 292266fc-ac40-47bf-8cfc-a85b89a655de292266fc-ac40-47bf-8cfc-a85b89a655de 3a4e2661-3109-4e56-8536-42c156e7dcfa3a4e2661-3109-4e56-8536-42c156e7dcfa 8d0eb2d1-a58e-4ea8-aa14-108074b7b6f98d0eb2d1-a58e-4ea8-aa14-108074b7b6f9 24d18c76-814a-41a4-bf53-1c219cccf79724d18c76-814a-41a4-bf53-1c219cccf797 ## Examples 下面的示例创建BMP 文件中的对象。The following example creates a object from a BMP file. 此代码将位图保存到三个 JPEG 文件，每个都有不同的质量级别。The code saves the bitmap to three JPEG files, each with a different quality level. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicImagingEndcoder3#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicImagingEndcoder3/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicImagingEndcoder3#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicImagingEndcoder3/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicImagingEndcoder3#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicImagingEndcoder3/VB/form1.vb#3)]

summary.span: 表示用呈现方法参数类别的全局唯一标识符初始化的 对象。

span.span: Represents an object that is initialized with the globally unique identifier for the render method parameter category.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当向图像编码器传递参数时，将参数封装在对象。When you pass a parameter to an image encoder, the parameter is encapsulated in an object. 域中的一个对象是指定的参数的类别的 GUID。One of the fields of the object is a GUID that specifies the category of the parameter. 使用的静态字段类来检索，其中包含所需的类别的参数。Use the static fields of the class to retrieve an that contains parameters of the desired category. 内置的图像编码器[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]接收属于多个类别的参数。The image encoders that are built into [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] receive parameters that belong to several categories. 下表列出了所有类别和与每个类别关联的 GUID。The following table lists all the categories and the GUID associated with each category. f2e455dc-09b3-4316-8260-676ada32481cf2e455dc-09b3-4316-8260-676ada32481c 66087055-ad66-4c7c-9a18-38a2310b833766087055-ad66-4c7c-9a18-38a2310b8337 e09d739d-ccd4-44ee-8eba-3fbf8be4fc58e09d739d-ccd4-44ee-8eba-3fbf8be4fc58 edb33bce-0266-4a77-b904-27216099e717edb33bce-0266-4a77-b904-27216099e717 1d5be4b5-fa4a-452d-9cdd-5db35105e7eb1d5be4b5-fa4a-452d-9cdd-5db35105e7eb 6d42c53a-229a-4825-8bb7-5c99e2b9a8b86d42c53a-229a-4825-8bb7-5c99e2b9a8b8 292266fc-ac40-47bf-8cfc-a85b89a655de292266fc-ac40-47bf-8cfc-a85b89a655de 3a4e2661-3109-4e56-8536-42c156e7dcfa3a4e2661-3109-4e56-8536-42c156e7dcfa 8d0eb2d1-a58e-4ea8-aa14-108074b7b6f98d0eb2d1-a58e-4ea8-aa14-108074b7b6f9 24d18c76-814a-41a4-bf53-1c219cccf79724d18c76-814a-41a4-bf53-1c219cccf797

span.span: Represents an object that is initialized with the globally unique identifier for the save flag parameter category.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当向图像编码器传递参数时，将参数封装在对象。When you pass a parameter to an image encoder, the parameter is encapsulated in an object. 域中的一个对象是指定的参数的类别的 GUID。One of the fields of the object is a GUID that specifies the category of the parameter. 使用的静态字段类来检索，其中包含所需的类别的参数。Use the static fields of the class to retrieve an that contains parameters of the desired category. 内置的图像编码器[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]接收属于多个类别的参数。The image encoders that are built into [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] receive parameters that belong to several categories. 下表列出了所有类别和与每个类别关联的 GUID。The following table lists all the categories and the GUID associated with each category. f2e455dc-09b3-4316-8260-676ada32481cf2e455dc-09b3-4316-8260-676ada32481c 66087055-ad66-4c7c-9a18-38a2310b833766087055-ad66-4c7c-9a18-38a2310b8337 e09d739d-ccd4-44ee-8eba-3fbf8be4fc58e09d739d-ccd4-44ee-8eba-3fbf8be4fc58 edb33bce-0266-4a77-b904-27216099e717edb33bce-0266-4a77-b904-27216099e717 1d5be4b5-fa4a-452d-9cdd-5db35105e7eb1d5be4b5-fa4a-452d-9cdd-5db35105e7eb 6d42c53a-229a-4825-8bb7-5c99e2b9a8b86d42c53a-229a-4825-8bb7-5c99e2b9a8b8 292266fc-ac40-47bf-8cfc-a85b89a655de292266fc-ac40-47bf-8cfc-a85b89a655de 3a4e2661-3109-4e56-8536-42c156e7dcfa3a4e2661-3109-4e56-8536-42c156e7dcfa 8d0eb2d1-a58e-4ea8-aa14-108074b7b6f98d0eb2d1-a58e-4ea8-aa14-108074b7b6f9 24d18c76-814a-41a4-bf53-1c219cccf79724d18c76-814a-41a4-bf53-1c219cccf797 ## Examples 下面的示例创建三个对象： 一个来自 BMP 文件、 一个从 JPEG 文件，一个从 PNG 文件。The following example creates three objects: one from a BMP file, one from a JPEG file, and one from a PNG file. 此代码将所有三个映像保存在一个多帧 TIFF 文件中。The code saves all three images in a single, multiple-frame TIFF file. span.span: Represents an object that is initialized with the globally unique identifier for the transformation parameter category.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当向图像编码器传递参数时，将参数封装在对象。When you pass a parameter to an image encoder, the parameter is encapsulated in an object. 域中的一个对象是指定的参数的类别的 GUID。One of the fields of the object is a GUID that specifies the category of the parameter. 使用的静态字段类来检索，其中包含所需的类别的参数。Use the static fields of the class to retrieve an that contains parameters of the desired category. 内置的图像编码器[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]接收属于多个类别的参数。The image encoders that are built into [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] receive parameters that belong to several categories. 下表列出了所有类别和与每个类别关联的 GUID。The following table lists all the categories and the GUID associated with each category. f2e455dc-09b3-4316-8260-676ada32481cf2e455dc-09b3-4316-8260-676ada32481c 66087055-ad66-4c7c-9a18-38a2310b833766087055-ad66-4c7c-9a18-38a2310b8337 e09d739d-ccd4-44ee-8eba-3fbf8be4fc58e09d739d-ccd4-44ee-8eba-3fbf8be4fc58 edb33bce-0266-4a77-b904-27216099e717edb33bce-0266-4a77-b904-27216099e717 1d5be4b5-fa4a-452d-9cdd-5db35105e7eb1d5be4b5-fa4a-452d-9cdd-5db35105e7eb 6d42c53a-229a-4825-8bb7-5c99e2b9a8b86d42c53a-229a-4825-8bb7-5c99e2b9a8b8 292266fc-ac40-47bf-8cfc-a85b89a655de292266fc-ac40-47bf-8cfc-a85b89a655de 3a4e2661-3109-4e56-8536-42c156e7dcfa3a4e2661-3109-4e56-8536-42c156e7dcfa 8d0eb2d1-a58e-4ea8-aa14-108074b7b6f98d0eb2d1-a58e-4ea8-aa14-108074b7b6f9 24d18c76-814a-41a4-bf53-1c219cccf79724d18c76-814a-41a4-bf53-1c219cccf797 ## Examples 下面的示例创建JPEG 文件中的对象。The following example creates a object from a JPEG file. 该代码将图像旋转 90 度，并将其保存在单独的 JPEG 文件。The code rotates the image 90 degrees and saves it in a separate JPEG file. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicImagingEncoderExample5#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicImagingEncoderExample5/CPP/form1.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicImagingEncoderExample5#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicImagingEncoderExample5/CS/form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicImagingEncoderExample5#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicImagingEncoderExample5/VB/form1.vb#5)]

span.span: Using Image Encoders and Decoders in Managed GDI+

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Drawing.Imaging.Encoder Version
Public Shared ReadOnly Version As Encoder

summary.span: 表示用版本参数类别的全局唯一标识符初始化的 对象。

span.span: Represents an object that is initialized with the globally unique identifier for the version parameter category.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类别指定的图像的压缩级别。The category specifies the level of compression for an image. 在用于构造，质量类别有用的值的范围是从 0 到 100。When used to construct an , the range of useful values for the quality category is from 0 to 100. 指定的数字越，越高压缩和图像的因此越低质量。The lower the number specified, the higher the compression and therefore the lower the quality of the image. 零将为您提供最低的图像质量和 100 之间的最高。Zero would give you the lowest quality image and 100 the highest. 当向图像编码器传递参数时，将参数封装在对象。When you pass a parameter to an image encoder, the parameter is encapsulated in an object. 域中的一个对象是指定的参数的类别的 GUID。One of the fields of the object is a GUID that specifies the category of the parameter. 使用的静态字段类来检索，其中包含所需的类别的参数。Use the static fields of the class to retrieve an that contains parameters of the desired category. 内置的图像编码器[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]接收属于多个类别的参数。The image encoders that are built into [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] receive parameters that belong to several categories. 下表列出了所有类别和与每个类别关联的 GUID。The following table lists all the categories and the GUID associated with each category. f2e455dc-09b3-4316-8260-676ada32481cf2e455dc-09b3-4316-8260-676ada32481c 66087055-ad66-4c7c-9a18-38a2310b833766087055-ad66-4c7c-9a18-38a2310b8337 e09d739d-ccd4-44ee-8eba-3fbf8be4fc58e09d739d-ccd4-44ee-8eba-3fbf8be4fc58 edb33bce-0266-4a77-b904-27216099e717edb33bce-0266-4a77-b904-27216099e717 1d5be4b5-fa4a-452d-9cdd-5db35105e7eb1d5be4b5-fa4a-452d-9cdd-5db35105e7eb 6d42c53a-229a-4825-8bb7-5c99e2b9a8b86d42c53a-229a-4825-8bb7-5c99e2b9a8b8 292266fc-ac40-47bf-8cfc-a85b89a655de292266fc-ac40-47bf-8cfc-a85b89a655de 3a4e2661-3109-4e56-8536-42c156e7dcfa3a4e2661-3109-4e56-8536-42c156e7dcfa 8d0eb2d1-a58e-4ea8-aa14-108074b7b6f98d0eb2d1-a58e-4ea8-aa14-108074b7b6f9 24d18c76-814a-41a4-bf53-1c219cccf79724d18c76-814a-41a4-bf53-1c219cccf797
